lead_paragraph: Pakistani and American officials said that they were increasingly convinced that Hakimullah Mehsud had died from wounds sustained in a drone strike.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Pakistani and American officials said that they were increasingly convinced that Hakimullah Mehsud had died from wounds sustained in a drone strike.

headline.main: Pakistani Taliban Leader Is Reported Dead
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Taliban Leader Is Believed to Have Been Killed in January Attack

byline.original: By JANE PERLEZ  and PIR ZUBAIR SHAH
byline.contributor: Peter Baker, Eric Schmitt and Scott Shane contributed reporting from Washington.
